price: 202. But (as for) their brothers (the devils) they (i.e. the devils) plunge them deeper into error, and they never stop short.
arabic: وَإِخۡوَٰنُهُمۡ يَمُدُّونَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡغَيِّ ثُمَّ لَا يُقۡصِرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: wa-ikh'wānuhum yamuddūnahum fī al-ghayi thumma lā yuq'ṣirūna
